content: समीक्ष् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To see, behold. {@--2@} To think of, consider, take into account; तेजसां हि न वयः समीक्ष्यते <ls>R. 11. 1</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 16.</ls> {@--3@} To examine carefully; as in असमीक्ष्यकारिन्. {@--4@} To look about for, search for. {@--5@} To investigate, examine.
